articles.title: SPA Session to Be Convened
articles.content:
SPA Session to Be Convened 
    Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The Third Session of the 11th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK which was postponed in accordance with a proposal of deputies on all the fronts of socialist construction will be convened on April 11, according to the March 31 decision of the SPA Presidium.

One Million Signature Campaign Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
One Million Signature Campaign Held in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) - At least 20 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Tok Islet Fellowship Society held a ceremony of declaring one million signature campaign against Japan's bid for permanent membership of the UNSC in Seoul on Mar. 28, according to south Korean KBS.
 Denouncing Japan's moves to seize Tok Islet, the organizations held that Japan is not qualified to sit on the UNSC as it is working hard to revive militarism.    
 They declared that they would conduct a widespread Internet signature campaign until June in solidarity with international peace organizations and present the one million signature paper to the United Nations.

articles.title: Danish Preparatory Committee to Commemorate Day of Sun Formed
articles.content:
Danish Preparatory Committee to Commemorate Day of Sun Formed 
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Danish preparatory committee to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President       Kim Il Sung, was inaugurated with due ceremony on Mar. 19.
 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, said at the ceremony that it is the common desire of not only the Korean people but the world progressives to significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun.    
 He stressed the need to organize functions such as photo exhibition and conduct energetic activities to help Danish know well about the DPRK on the occasion of the day.
 Present at the ceremony were the vice-chairman of the National Leadership of the Communist Party of Denmark (Marxist-Leninist), the international secretary of the Communist Party of Denmark and the chairman and executive members of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Egypt
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Egypt 
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian preparatory committee for commemorations of the Day of the Sun and the "meeting praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu" was inaugurated with due ceremony on Mar. 28.
 Muhammad al Husseini al Akad, vice-minister of Agriculture, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set the commemoration period from April 1 to August 30 and decided to hold colorful events including a seminar, a meeting and a film show.

articles.title: DPRK's Efforts for Peaceful Solution to Korean Issue Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Efforts for Peaceful Solution to Korean Issue Supported 
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) - Branko Crvenkovski, president of Macedonia, supported the DPRK's efforts to achieve political and economic development, enhance the standard of people's living, reunify the country and peacefully settle the issue of the Korean Peninsula under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il when meeting Kim Ha Dong, DPRK ambassador to his country, who paid a farewell call on him on Mar. 25.
 The Macedonian government would continue to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK on the basis of sovereignty, equality and territorial integrity, the principle governing its foreign policy, he noted, stressing that he would strive hard to boost the good friendly relations between the two peoples.

Football Match Held between DPRK and Iranian Teams
articles.content:
Football Match Held between DPRK and Iranian Teams
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A football match between the DPRK and the Iranian teams belonging to the group B of the 2006 World Cup Asian regional qualifier took place in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
 The Iranian team won the game 2:0.    
 At the end of the match all the spectators were angered and vigorously protested the wrong refereeing by the Syrian referee and linesmen.

Kim Yong Nam Meets German Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets German Delegation
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the German-Korean Parliamentary Group headed by Hartmut Koschyk, member of the Bundestag (Federal Assembly) of Germany and chairman of the group, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on March 31.
 Present there were Kim Ung Chol, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly, and Doris Hertrampf, German ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, upon hearing the sad news that a recent powerful earthquake in northern Sumatra, Indonesia, claimed many human lives and caused large material losses, sent deep sympathy and consolation to Indonesian President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono and residents in the affected area today.
 In the message of sympathy he expressed the belief that the president and the government of Indonesia would remove the aftermaths of natural disasters as early as possible and stabilize the living of residents in the afflicted
area.
